pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, September 19, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Science and Sport Kirsty Duncan will host the Prime Ministerâ€™s Science Fair.
